the Commons culture committee, warned the prime minister now faced serious questions. "This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about," Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the prime minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. "It's a mark of the man that he would sneak out a statement on a Friday morning on a busy news day. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth. His remarks were echoed by Chris Bryant, the former Labour Europe minister, who is seeking to sue the police over allegations that his phone was illegally hacked on behalf of the News of the World.

Still, she said Michael Vick 's dogfighting operation probably helped pit bulls' bad rep because it showed that "people can reintroduce these dogs back into a society that's not going to abuse them." The owner is responsible for what an animal does. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Hansen said. 2001 I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today," Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a post on the Official Google Inc. Blog. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process. And our emerging businesses-display, Android, YouTube and Chrome-are on fire. Of course, like any successful organization we've had our fair share of good luck, but the entire team-now over 24,000 Googlers globally-deserves most of the credit. Google Inc. 's co-founders brought in Mr. Eric Schmidt , a trained computer scientist, to shepherd the young company along in the early days of the dot-com boom and eventually he helped take Google Inc. public in 2004.
